I call on the goverment to  cut foreign aid which is currently running at over 12 billion pounds .
this is sheduled to rise to 20 billion .
 we spend just over 12 billion on our police force which keeps us safe .
we have homeless on the streets , we are cutting police . troops , nurses  and fireman ,
what right have the goverment to send our money to foreign aid when we are being asked to cut our cloth
charity begins at home when our problems are solved we will help others
